org.drooms.api

Interface CustomPathBasedStrategy

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Strategy

    public interface CustomPathBasedStrategy
extends Strategy
    A strategy that provides its own path-finding algorithm to be used by the game. The time that this path-finding algorithm takes will be counted into the total decision run time limit. There are various available options for your strategies to choose from:
    UnweightedShortestPath from the JUNG library.
    The default.
    UnweightedAStarShortestPath from the game implementation package.
    This is an experimental implementation of an algorithm that is supposed to be the best.
    Your own.
    Just make sure that when no path is found, the implementation returns empty collection. DijkstraShortestPath throws exception in such case and that will mess up your rules.

      Return a fresh instance of the path-finding algorithm to find paths between nodes in a given graph.

      • Methods inherited from interface org.drooms.api.Strategy

        enableAudit, getKnowledgeBuilder, getName

    • Method Detail

      • getShortestPathAlgorithm

        edu.uci.ics.jung.algorithms.shortestpath.ShortestPath<Node,Edge> getShortestPathAlgorithm(edu.uci.ics.jung.graph.Graph<Node,Edge> graph)
        Return a fresh instance of the path-finding algorithm to find paths between nodes in a given graph.
        Parameters:
        graph - The graph which the algo should operate on. This graph only contains edges between nodes where the worm can move. Nodes where there are walls, or nodes where there's other worms, are not included in this graph.
        Returns:
        The algorithm to be used for ShortestPathUtils.getPath(Graph, ShortestPath, Object, Object) .
